items.sentence: Tom\'s mother told him not to jump on his bed.
Tom\'s parents are probably worried about him.
What do people eat for breakfast in Australia?
What time is your plane scheduled to take off?
I\'ll probably tell Tom that I can\'t do that.
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary is a vegetarian.
I don\'t think Tom will be at school tomorrow.
I don\'t think any more students want to come.
Tom had to work three shifts to pay his bills.
Tom has a good chance of winning the election.
Tom said something the other night about that.
Tom said that he needed to get some fresh air.
Tom said that he told Mary to do her homework.
Tom said that he was worried about his future.
Tom wondered why there was a dog in his house.
Tom can\'t believe how happy Mary seems to be.
Tom has trouble dealing with people like Mary.
Please take care of our dog while we\'re away.
Tom opened his refrigerator and looked inside.
Tom used to play both baseball and basketball.
